content.text: Mr. GOHMERT. Madam Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. GOHMERT

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 1 o'clock and 31 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until Monday, 
November 6, 2017, at noon for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
